original_text: It shall have an opening for the head in the middle of it, with a woven binding around the opening, like the opening in a garment, so that it may not tear.
korean_text: 두 어깨 사이에 머리 들어갈 구멍을 내고 그 주위에 갑옷 깃 같이 깃을 짜서 찢어지지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: It shall have an opening for the head
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 머리를 위한 터널이 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: with a woven binding around the opening
sentences.korean_translation: 그 터널 주위에 짜서 만든 테두리가 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: like the opening in a garment
so that it may not tear
